FuncDef: The display layer3-subscriber statistics port-mismatch command displays statistics on Layer 3 users' packets that are discarded due to an interface mismatch.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a Layer 3 user is already online, but packets of this user are still sent to the device through another interface, the device discards the packets because it does not support interface switching. To check statistics on these discarded packets to locate the fault, run the display layer3-subscriber statistics port-mismatch command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
